channel.title: Small help please? :)
channel.description:
Hi.
I'm running a deltascape source as my base, I've fixed most glitches but one I really am tired of trying is the Dark bow glitch can someone please help me fix this?
All help appreciated![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2009, 12:29:37 pm[/size][hr]No one? :(

item.title: Small help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @killboy600 killboy600
item.description:
@killboy600 wrote:

It’s on all deltascape servers, basically you click special attack just before you hit and take it off, repeating that makes you hit 30 40 instead of the normal 12 19 or something.

Read full topic
